00018    template <typename E>
00019    struct handle_body_type { };

00022    struct handle_body_ptr { };

00028 #define REGISTER_TOPIC_TRAITS(TOPIC) \
00029 namespace dds { \
00030   template<> struct topic_type_support<TOPIC> { \
00031     typedef TOPIC##TypeSupport type; \
00032   }; \
00033  \
00034   template<> struct topic_data_writer<TOPIC> { \
00035     typedef TOPIC##DataWriter type;                    \
00036   }; \
00037   \
00038   template<> struct topic_data_reader<TOPIC> { \
00039     typedef TOPIC##DataReader type; \
00040   }; \
00041   template<> struct topic_data_seq<TOPIC> { \
00042     typedef TOPIC##Seq type; \
00043   }; \
00044 }  
00045 
00046 #define DEFINE_HANDLE_BODY_TRAITS(H, B)         \
00047   template<> struct handle_body_ptr<H> {        \
00048     typedef B* type;                            \
00049   };                                            \
00050   template<> struct handle_body_type<H> {       \
00051     typedef B type;                             \
00052   };                                            \
00053   template<> struct handle_body_ref<H> {        \
00054     typedef B& ref;                             \
00055   };
00056 
00057 #endif /* AC_SIMD_DDS_TRAITS_HPP */
